item.title: Imperial hosts Muslim Student Panel
item.author: Hafiza Irshad,Ismaeel Karmani,
item.description: What is MSP? Muslim Student Panel (MSP) is a campaign hosted by Imperial College Union in collaboration with 13 Islamic Societies across the UK. It was formed in order to support prospective university students in their decisions in pursuing higher education. Whilst there is an abundance of â€¦
